document_data.name: Shatterstone
document_data.mainbody: '''Shatterstone''' was the [[divine realm]] of [[Vaprak]], a patron of [[ogre]]s and [[troll]]s in the [[Giant pantheon]], prior to the [[Spellplague]].
document_data.Cosmography: In the [[Great Wheel cosmology]], this realm was located in [[Abyss]], While in the [[World Tree cosmology]], Shatterstone was situated in [[Jotunheim]] alongside the divine realms of the other members of the Giant pantheon.
document_data.Description: In the World Tree cosmology, Shatterstone was said to be a pitiful cave at the base of a great cliff.
document_data.Inhabitants: This divine realm was primarily inhabited by Vaprak's [[petitioner]]s. They were greatly despised by all the other [[giant]] inhabitants of Jotunheim and hid from them at all cost.
